Literature.Title: Therapeutic Potential of Trp-Rich Engineered Amphiphiles by Single Hydrophobic Amino Acid End-Tagging

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:10% Cytotoxicity=32 µM,Intestinal Porcine Epithelial Cells IPEC-J2:15% Cytotoxicity=32 µM
